Name: Pandemos
About the game: Pandemos is an Arcade-Defender style game with simplified controls where we must destroy all the Agent Viruses in every point of the world and save the Cells from Extinction. Features Eliminate all Agents before they attack the Cells, making them new Agents: Use the specials of each protector to defend the Cells: Twelve different enemy types scattered in each stage: Five different protectors with specific skills and specials: -I unlocked the guards accumulating points when completing the levels. And much more: Several stages at different points in the world of Pandemos Beware of the Hordes of Virus Agents Simplified gameplay Recommended for fans of Pixelart-style games Soundtrack with fun and carefully selected mood Designed for players who enjoy fun Arcade-style games, differentiated Tower Defense Game inspired by the current moment of Pandemic Will you be able to control the dangerous threats in Pandemos, through the Protectors and their abilities and prevent the complete extinction of the Cells?
Meta Title: Pandemos: Dec 20, 2020, Scalars Games and Full Overview
